scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd bot && npm install"
scripts.all:build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run frontend:build" "cd backend && npm run backend:build" "cd bot && npm run bot:build"
scripts.e2e: cd backend && concurrently "npm run backend:start"  "cd.. && cypress open"
